root.title: Iran's Internet Blackout and Street Clashes Signal Deepening Crisis
root.content:
Iran's Internet Blackout and Street Clashes Signal Deepening Crisis

A severe crackdown by Iranian authorities has failed to quell a wave of nationwide protests, now entering a dangerous new phase marked by intense violence and a near-total internet blackout. Sparked by soaring inflation and economic hardship, the demonstrations have rapidly evolved into a direct challenge to the country's clerical leadership,
